column4: hey guys, need help, is there any way to set up a ati dual monitor ?
im usuing ubuntu and i cant get a driver for my radeon 7200 to support it
yes, "xinerama" is the keyword
you already have a driver that supports it
you really found no documentation on google at all for "ubuntu xinerama howto"?
now you know :)
and you followed that howto or not?
which part of that page confuses you?
do not paste in here
you open a terminal
applications -> system tools -> terminal
each line at a time, yes
correct
then you cut and pasted in correctly
try again
the one you tried to do now
then you're copying it wrong
show us what you're pasting
that doesn't show us the error at all
you can't expect help from strangers
and you haven't shown us the error from cp yet
